blogPost.excerpt: An extremely entertaining musical guessing game where you race against friends to name that tune! "The music round of a pub quiz on steroids". Great for livening up a group Zoom call. Also includes single player quizzes and custom quiz creator.
blogPost.body: An extremely entertaining musical guessing game where you race against friends to name that tune! "The music round of a pub quiz on steroids". Great for livening up a group Zoom call. Also includes single player quizzes and custom quiz creator.
blogPost.title: Songlio - Free musical guessing game: race friends to name that tune
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 一个极富娱乐性的音乐猜谜游戏，在这里你可以和朋友比赛说出那首曲子的名字! "音乐轮的酒吧问答的立体化"。非常适合在小组Zoom通话中活跃起来。还包括单人测验和自定义测验创建者。
localize.tagline: 免费的音乐猜谜游戏：比赛的朋友们来命名这首曲子。

localize.description: 一個極富娛樂性的音樂猜謎遊戲，在這裏你可以和朋友比賽說出那首曲子的名字! "音樂輪的酒吧問答的立體化"。非常適合在小組Zoom通話中活躍起來。還包括單人測驗和自定義測驗創建者。
localize.tagline: 免費的音樂猜謎遊戲：比賽的朋友們來命名這首曲子。

previous.excerpt: Seamlessly create an excellent social media schedule that works for you. From advanced editing options for your posts to recycling your best evergreen content, you can now grow your business’ online impact in no-time.
previous.title: SocialBee - Get more leads from social media

localize.description: 无缝创建一个优秀的社交媒体时间表，为你工作。从您的帖子的高级编辑选项到回收您最好的常青内容，您现在可以在短时间内增加您的企业的在线影响力。
localize.tagline: 从社交媒体上获得更多线索

localize.description: 無縫創建一個優秀的社交媒體時間表，爲你工作。從您的帖子的高級編輯選項到回收您最好的常青內容，您現在可以在短時間內增加您的企業的在線影響力。
localize.tagline: 從社交媒體上獲得更多線索

next.excerpt: Amplication is an open source development tool. It helps you develop quality Node.js applications without spending time on repetitive coding tasks.
next.title: Amplication - Instantly generate Node.js apps with GraphQL and REST API

localize.description: Amplication是一个开源的开发工具。它可以帮助你开发高质量的Node.js应用，而无需花费时间在重复的编码任务上。
localize.tagline: 使用GraphQL和REST API即时生成Node.js应用。

localize.description: Amplication是一個開源的開發工具。它可以幫助你開發高質量的Node.js應用，而無需花費時間在重複的編碼任務上。
localize.tagline: 使用GraphQL和REST API即時生成Node.js應用。
